author: Wayne Gretzky
text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take
I skae to where the puck is going to be, not to where it has been

author: Charles Swindoll
text: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it
We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations

author: Henry David Thoreau
text: Go confidently in the direction of your dream.  Live the life you have imagined.
Our life is frittered away by detail... simplify, simplify

author: George Addair
text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear
